name: Alien Fiends
description:
Alien Fiends
Space Station 43 has been invaded by hideous aliens. 
You as Lone Trooper X  must board the ship and rescue
all the humans.
When all the humans have been collected a portal will
activate taking you to the next level.

Keys/ Joypad
W, A, S, D, Space - or arrow keys
M - Music On/Off (Start Menu Only)
P / Select Button = Pause

Enjoy!
